name: SmoothMixFM
0:
”Alexa, start Smooth Mix FM”
”Alexa, launch Smooth Mix FM”
”Alexa, open Smooth Mix FM”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smooth mix f. m.
des: We are an Online 24/7 Radio Station based in the UK we play all kinds of genera e.g the '80s 90's '00s, Charts and New Releases. Let the radio waves wake you up in the morning with their soothing music and cheer you up on dull days. you got to love https://smoothmixfm.co.uk. You will be surprised to hear that the history of Radio is now more than 100 years old! Happy public radio broadcasting day. Come listen to our live DJs throughout the week and request that favourite song you enjoy listening to. You can also become a staff member by applying at https://smoothmixfm.co.uk.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
